sourcesContent:
// libraries import React, { Component } from 'react' import get from 'lodash/get' // Components import { formatCurrency } from 'utils' export default class Iva extends Component { render () { const { calculation } = this.props return (

Concepto

Monto

Ingresos

Gravados al 16%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.iva, ['taxed_incomes_16'], 0) )}

IVA por pagar

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['iva_to_pay_16'], 0))}

Gravados al 8%

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['taxed_incomes_8'], 0))}

IVA por pagar

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['iva_to_pay_8'], 0))}

Gravados al 0%

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['taxed_incomes_0'], 0))}

IVA por pagar

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['iva_to_pay_0'], 0))}

Exentos

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.iva, ['exempted_incomes'], 0) )}

Total IVA por pagar

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.iva, ['total_iva_to_pay'], 0) )}

Gastos

Gravados al 16%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.iva, ['taxed_expenses_16'], 0) )}

IVA acreditable

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['credit_iva_16'], 0))}

Gravados al 8%

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.iva, ['taxed_expenses_8'], 0) )}

IVA acreditable

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['credit_iva_8'], 0))}

Total de IVA acreditable antes de proporción

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.iva, ['iva_before_proportion'], 0) )}

Proporción aplicable

{`${get(calculation.iva, ['applicable_amount'], 0)}%`}

Total de IVA acreditable después de proporción

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['total_credit_iva']))}

{calculation.iva.positive_balance < 0 ? 'Saldo a favor' : 'Saldo a cargo'}

{formatCurrency( get(calculation.iva, ['positive_balance'], 0) )}

Saldo a favor aplicado

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['applied_offsets'], 0))}

IVA a retenido

{formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['withheld_iva'], 0))}

IVA por pagar

{calculation.iva.positive_iva < 0 ? formatCurrency(0) : formatCurrency(get(calculation.iva, ['positive_iva'], 0))}

) } }
